  • Method Details

    • hideParams

      protected void hideParams()
      Hides the UI elements related to the application parameters.

    • hideTitle

      protected void hideTitle()
      Hides the title-related UI elements. This method hides the following title elements: - Syllogism Master button - Syllogism Understand button

    • initialize

      protected void initialize()
      Initializes the application interface when the class is loaded. This method: - Sets the background image from a relative path. - Loads language and effect settings from a JSON file. - Updates UI labels based on the selected language (French or English). - Sets up click event handlers for several UI elements (e.g., buttons, labels). - Adds a zoom effect to several UI elements for visual feedback.

    • typewriterEffect

      public void typewriterEffect(javafx.scene.control.Label label, String text)
